title: 50 First Dates
short_plot_summary: Set in Hawaii, Lucy, a woman with short-term memory loss, and Henry, a kind-hearted man, fall in love. Henry has to make Lucy fall in love with him every day anew.
explanation: A hibiscus flower, symbolizing the beautiful Hawaiian setting of the movie
A blond woman, representing Lucy, the main character with memory loss
A pancake, referencing Henry's attempt to pronounce 'pancake' when pretending he cannot read to get Lucy's attention
A boat, symbolizing Henry's schooner, the Sea Serpent, which he plans to sail to Alaska to study underwater life but faces a mishap at the beginning of the movie
A dolphin, illustrating Henry's job as a marine life veterinarian at Sea Life Park in Hawaii
